scripts.build: rm -rf _site & jekyll build && npm run build-projects && cd _site && zip -r site.zip *
scripts.build-projects: rm -rf projects && mkdir -p projects && npm run build-project-alkonline && npm run build-project-journal
scripts.build-project-alkonline: cd projects && git clone https://github.com/stefan-moraru/alkonline-web.git alkonline-temp && cd alkonline-temp && npm run build && mv dist ../alkonline && cd .. && rm -rf alkonline-temp
scripts.build-project-journal: cd projects && git clone https://github.com/stefan-moraru/jorunal.git journal-temp && cd journal-temp && npm run build && mv dist ../journal && cd .. && rm -rf journal-temp
